data.message: Please keep sports under Trending Sports and Celebrities under the Celebrity tabs.  Pehaps a News tab would be appropriate.  That's all I'm really interested in.

replies.message: Hi Betsy. You can hide Trending topics you don't want to see by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2uWhuCc. -Jessica
That's what I'm doing, but it is a nuisance and takes too long.  What I'd like is for you to put comments on sports and celebrities in their respective tabs and not in the default trending.

Would like a permanent fix.  The problem is all the suggestions you offer keep showing up over and over and over.  The worst are the trending (don't care about sports or celebrities PERIOD!) and suggested pages - same thing over and over even though I delete them  Shouldn't have to do it every time I sign on.
